payment.title: Online payment

payment_activation.title: Activation of payments
payment_activation.help: If payments are enabled, you collect payments from your customers and are subject to PayGreen* billing.

payment.text1: Make the payment process easier on your online sales platform.
payment.text2: Optimize sales on your e-commerce platform.
payment.description: If you have already created your PayGreen payment area, log in now to simply collect online payments.
